      • getContentFromPath

        private java.lang.String getContentFromPath(java.lang.String sourcePath,
                                            HostsSourceType sourceType)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        note that for read from file, this will just load all to memory. not fit if need to read a very large file. However for getting the host name. normally it is fine. for reading large file, should use iostream.
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - the source path
        sourceType - the source type
        Returns:
        the content from path
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • setTargetHostsFromList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> setTargetHostsFromList(java.util.List<java.lang.String> targetHosts)
        Description copied from interface: ITargetHostsBuilder
        Sets the target hosts from list. Will remove duplicate from it. Will create a new array list because the original one may be unmodifiable.
